text:
Splendid Decisions

Raskolnikov, alone in his room, seethes with anger.  
His thoughts spiral into darkness.  
“Mr. Luzhin? Cunning and rude!”  

---

Raskolnikov clenches his fists, frustration boiling.  
“Mother’s letter? A cruel joke!”  
“Why sacrifice Dounia for him?”  

---

He imagines confronting Luzhin, rage igniting.  
“If I see him... I might kill!”  
“Dounia deserves better than this!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov's intense bitterness towards his mother's letter reveals his strong opposition to Dounia's impending marriage to Mr. Luzhin.
